svg.text: Observer Patch Holography: From Axioms to Reality
How two parameters and four axioms derive all features of physics
WHY OPH SUCCEEDS WHERE GUTS FAIL
Gauge group is product, not embedded
None observed despite decades of search

Observer Patch Holography — The universe isn't built to be consistent. Consistency is what builds the universe.
